# Crypto Trading System - Auto-generated cron jobs
# Generated on: 2025-09-11 16:35:50

# Balance Sync - Sync account balance every 2 minutes
*/2 * * * * C:\xampp\php\php.exe C:\xampp\htdocs\trade/jobs/balance-sync.php >> C:\xampp\htdocs\trade/jobs/cron.log 2>&1

# Position Sync - Sync positions every 3 minutes
*/3 * * * * C:\xampp\php\php.exe C:\xampp\htdocs\trade/jobs/position-sync.php >> C:\xampp\htdocs\trade/jobs/cron.log 2>&1

# SL/TP Monitor - Check and create missing SL/TP orders every 5 minutes
*/5 * * * * C:\xampp\php\php.exe C:\xampp\htdocs\trade/jobs/sl-tp-monitor.php >> C:\xampp\htdocs\trade/jobs/cron.log 2>&1
